Uses of Interface
de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayTransaction

  • Packages that use PayTransaction 
    Package Description
    de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment  

    • Uses of PayTransaction in de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment

      Methods in de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment that return PayTransaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.booking(long cents, long reservedCents, int payType, int traceNr, java.lang.String aid, java.lang.Boolean isGiroMaestro, ProductCategory[] productCategories, PayMedia media)
      Method to finalize a reservation.
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.bookingWithoutCard(long cents, long reservedCents, int payType, java.lang.String cardNr, int expiredMonth, int expiredYear, int traceNr, java.lang.String aid, java.lang.Boolean isGiroMaestro, ProductCategory[] productCategories, PayMedia media)
      Same method as PayTerminal.booking(), but no need to insert a card in the card reader.
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.increaseReservation(long cents, int payType, int traceNr, java.lang.String aid, ProductCategory[] productCategories, PayMedia media)
      Convenience method to increase a previously reserved amount.
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.increaseReservationWithoutCard(long cents, int payType, java.lang.String cardNr, int expiredMonth, int expiredYear, int traceNr, java.lang.String aid, ProductCategory[] productCategories, PayMedia media)
      Same method as PayTerminal.increaseReservation(), but no need to insert a card in the card reader.
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.payment(long cents, int payType, PayMedia media)
      Deprecated since 5.1; use PayTerminal.payment(long, int, de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.ProductCategory[], de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayMedia) with empty productCategories parameter instead.
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.payment(long cents, int payType, ProductCategory[] productCategories, PayMedia media)
      This method starts a payment transaction.
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.paymentWithoutCard(long cents, int payType, java.lang.String cardNr, int expiredMonth, int expiredYear, ProductCategory[] productCategories, PayMedia media)
      This method starts a payment transaction without any card present.
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.refund(long cents, int payType, PayMedia media)
      Deprecated since 5.1; use PayTerminal.refund(long, int, de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.ProductCategory[], de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayMedia media) with empty productCategories parameter instead.
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.refund(long cents, int payType, ProductCategory[] productCategories, PayMedia media)
      This method starts a refund transaction.
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.refundWithoutCard(long cents, int payType, java.lang.String cardNr, int expiredMonth, int expiredYear, ProductCategory[] productCategories, PayMedia media)
      Method to start a refund without inserting a card.
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.reservation(long cents, int payType, ProductCategory[] productCategories, PayMedia media)
      Invoke this method to start a reservation.
      PayTransaction PayTerminal.reservationWithoutCard(long cents, int payType, java.lang.String cardNr, int expiredMonth, int expiredYear, ProductCategory[] productCategories, PayMedia media)
      Same method as PayTerminal.reservation(), but no need to insert a card in the card reader.
